articles.title: DPRK Will Regard Any Provocation as Declaration of War: KCNA
articles.content:
DPRK Will Regard Any Provocation as Declaration of War: KCNA
Pyongyang, March 21 (KCNA) -- The Korean nation has ardently wished to see the denuclearization of the Korean Peninsula at an early date as it has been exposed to a more direct nuclear threat for such a long period than any other nation in the world.
					However, this ardent desire and wish are facing a new grave challenge due to the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors' policy of confrontation with the DPRK and moves to provoke a nuclear war.
					
					The south Korean puppet authorities are getting evermore undisguised in their moves to turn "the nuclear security summit" to be held in Seoul into a confab on a nuclear racket against the DPRK.
					
					Coming to the surface is their attempt to put the "nuclear issue in the north" on the agenda of the summit in the wake of such reckless remarks that "the summit is of particularly weighty significance for south Korea being exposed to a nuclear threat" and "it is the first process for building a world free from nukes."
					
					Lee Myung Bak on March 19 let loose sheer sophism that "the summit may play a big role in expanding the international community's support for the denuclearization of the north," disclosing his ulterior motive.
					
					Kim Song Hwan, puppet minister of Foreign Affairs and Trade, Rim Song Nam, puppet chief delegate to the six-party talks, and others who are responsible for discussing the issue of the denuclearization of the Korean Peninsula are floating wild rumors that "there may be speeches on the north's nuclear issue," "written statements may be presented" and "there may be a message urging the north to scrap nuclear substance" at the summit.
					
					Also heard from the conservative media are outbursts echoing the puppet authorities' claims that "the nuclear issue of the north is likely to be addressed in depth" and "the parties concerned to the six-party talks will address the nuclear issue of the north in an intensive manner."
					
					Worse still, even an idea of working out a draft "Seoul communique" on the premise of "nuclear threat from the north" is high on the agenda.
					
					This clearly testifies to the fact that the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors is set to use the forthcoming international forum as a lever for confrontation with the DPRK by availing itself of its position as a host.
					
					The Seoul "nuclear security summit" is a continuation and extension of the group's frantic anti-DPRK nuclear racket. The DPRK has already clarified its principle stand over this issue and made it clear that international norms are strictly observed in storing and managing nuclear substance.
					
					What should be stated emphatically is that the issue of the denuclearization of the Korean Peninsula is that of denuclearizing the whole peninsula. Accordingly, "the north's nuclear issue" has never existed, in fact, and there is no justification to bring it up for discussion at the summit. 
					
					The Lee group's persistent efforts to place "the north's nuclear issue" on the agenda of the Seoul "summit" are nothing but a revelation of its sinister attempt to justify its moves for a nuclear war against the DPRK and a curtain-raiser to the worldwide politically-motivated farce to divert elsewhere public criticism of it and escape a miserable defeat in the forthcoming "election."
					
					It is a ridiculous attempt and an absolutely unpardonable criminal act for Lee Myung Bak, traitor for all ages, to bring someone's "nuclear issue" up for discussion. The Lee group is foolish enough to use the "summit" as a card for justifying its military threat and moves for a nuclear war against the DPRK. 
					
					Crying out for "coping with the north's possible terrorism by biological weapons and its attack to disturb GPS", the group had already staged such war drills as "combined protection drills of civilians, officials, military and police forces" and "combined drill to combat terrorism".
					
					Kim Kwan Jin, puppet minister of Defense, even issued an order "to shower a ten-fold retaliatory fire" in case the north provokes. He cried out for "retaliating against the north till its full surrender in the spirit of taking revenge upon it for the sunken 'Cheonan' warship and the Yonphyong Island shelling case."
					
					Jong Sung Jo, chairman of the Joint Chiefs of Staff, also issued an order to "take prompt strong retaliatory strikes." He said the north should be forced to "deeply regret for its action".
					
					The Lee group is keen to use the "summit" as a curtain-raiser to its nuclear war against the DPRK.
					
					The DPRK cannot but take a serious note of this fact.
					
					No one can vouch that Lee would not use the "summit" for achieving his sinister aim as he left no means untried to bedevil the inter-Korean relations in the past.
					
					This is proved by the group which behaved so meanly in the wake of the DPRK's announcement that it would launch satellite Kwangmyongsong-3.
					
					The group is making last-ditch efforts to deny even the DPRK's right to use space for peaceful purposes and infringe upon its sovereignty. This behavior suffices to guess how reckless it will go with this "summit" as an occasion.
					
					The situation on the peninsula has reached an uncontrollably serious phase due to the group's thrice-cursed act of hurting the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK.
					
					No one can predict how the situation will deteriorate in the future.
					
					In case "the north's nuclear issue" is placed on the agenda at the Seoul "summit" and such provocation as "issuing a statement" against the DPRK is perpetrated, this will be recorded in history as an intolerable insult to the wishes of the peerlessly great men of Mt. Paektu who left the denuclearization of the peninsula as their behests and as another thrice-cursed hideous crime.
					
					It is a mockery of the public at home and abroad and shame on the world community to open the "summit" to discuss nuclear security in south Korea, the world's biggest nuclear arsenal. 
					
					To take part in Lee's indiscreet burlesque is as reckless an act as driving the situation on the peninsula to the worst phase and adding fuel to the flames. 
					
					Any provocation will amount to a declaration of a war against the DPRK and result in throwing a stumbling block in the way of discussing the denuclearization of the peninsula.

articles.title: Congratulations to German President
articles.content:
Congratulations to German President
Pyongyang, March 21 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Monday sent a congratulatory message to Joachim Gauck upon his election as president of Germany.
					Kim wished him success in his work for the prosperity of his country.

articles.title: Unhasu Concert Given Distinctively
articles.content:
Unhasu Concert Given Distinctively
Pyongyang, March 21 (KCNA) -- A concert was given by the Unhasu Orchestra in Pyongyang on March 8 to mark the International Women's Day, with the dear respected Kim Jong Un in attendance. 
					The concert was held in a very distinctive way.
					
					Male singers, who took on the stage to sing "Women Are Flowers" with mixed chorus, went to the audience to present flowers to women. 
					
					When an orchestral music "Swinging Girl" began to be played, several couples came out to aisles from the audience and danced joyously to the tune of the music.
					
					Seen among the dancers were a celebrated announcer and film and drama stars and their spouses.
					
					"Let's Go to Kwanghan Pavilion" sung by a father and his son drew a high acclamation.
					
					The stage was also taken by a first vice department director of the C.C., the Workers' Party of Korea and his wife, a vice-director of the General Political Bureau of the Korean People's Army and his wife and a vice-chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission and his family members.
					
					The concert climaxed with a solo of a woman who was a vocalist at the Pochonbo Electronic Ensemble.
					
					Before the solo began, the emcee tenderly asked the pregnant woman if she could sing all three verses and the conductor asked her about major.
					
					Kim Jong Un enjoyed the performance with a broad smile on his face all the time.

articles.title: Self-sacrificing Spirit Displayed in DPRK
articles.content:
Self-sacrificing Spirit Displayed in DPRK
Pyongyang, March 21 (KCNA) -- The Democratic People's Republic of Korea recently awarded the title of Republic Hero to a mineworker, Pak Thae Son, and a farmer, Ri Chang Son, who sacrificed their lives for their colleagues.
					Such admirable persons of virtue can be found anywhere in the DPRK.
					
					One of them is Ko Hak Chol, a worker of the Tukjang Youth Coal Mine under the Tukjang Area Coal Mining Complex.
					
					In December last, Ko, 24, died after rescuing his mate from a big stone falling from the roof of a cutting face. If he had moved back some steps, he would have preserved his life. But he did not hesitate to sacrifice himself for his mate.
					
					Such practices are commonplace in the DPRK whose people deem it as pride and honor to devote themselves to their comrades.

articles.title: Right to Choice Rests with All Nations
articles.content:
Right to Choice Rests with All Nations
Pyongyang, March 21 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Korean Committee of Space Technology in a statement on March 16 declared that the Democratic People's Republic of Korea would launch Kwangmyongsong-3, an earth observation satellite, in April to mark the 100th birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (April 15).
					After the announcement, some forces have begun slinging mud at the DPRK, interpreting the launch as a "missile test-fire".
					
					In this regard, Kim Haeng Son, a department head of Kim Chaek University of Technology, told KCNA:
					
					"The launch of satellite has turned to be a worldwide trend nowadays. It is not exclusive to specified nations.
					
					Many countries and regions throughout the world make scientific researches into the use of space, applying their findings to practice.
					
					Their abuses of the DPRK's satellite launch are construed otherwise than an undisguised intervention in a sovereign state.
					
					The upcoming launch of Kwangmyongsong-3 entirely pertains to the sovereignty of the DPRK.
					
					I believe that the DPRK will launch the satellite on any account, whatever they say."
					
					Choe Kwang Guk, a vice-director of the Central Meteorological Research Institute under the Hydro-meteorological Service, said:
					
					Right to choice rests with all nations. Space development can never be put in hands of specified nations.
					
					Research into meteorology and hydrology badly needs a working satellite.
					
					Thereby, we the meteorologists are greatly interested in the upcoming launch.
					
					Nobody has a right to accuse the DPRK of its choice.

articles.title: Kwangjong Revolutionary Site
articles.content:
Kwangjong Revolutionary Site
Pyongyang, March 21 (KCNA) -- The Kwangjong Revolutionary Site in Sungho County, North Hwanghae Province of the DPRK, is a historic place where Kim Hyong Jik conducted anti-Japanese activities from 1911 to 1921.
					Kim Hyong Jik, an indomitable revolutionary fighter, educated local people and advocates of the independence movement in the spirit of national independence and anti-Japanese patriotic idea and aroused them to the struggle for national liberation.
					
					He stressed that it was quite possible to liberate the country from the Japanese imperialists' colonial rule when all Koreans were closely united and that the young people in particular should turn out in a sacred war for independence.
					
					One day he proposed to develop the existing fraternity in that locality into a mass organization and call it Kwangjong Association.
					
					Thereby, the Association emerged a political organization for rallying broad masses and educating them in the anti-Japanese idea on October 20, 1916.
					
					Under his energetic guidance, the organization made signal achievements in raising independence movement funds, storing up grain reserves, controlling major ferries, spreading progressive ideas among workers.
					
					Kim Hyong Jik also roused local women to the anti-Japanese struggle, teaching them Korean alphabets.
					
					Many people are visiting the site with the approach of the anniversary of the Korean National Association (March 23, 1917).

articles.title: Sinhung Restaurant Renovated
articles.content:
Sinhung Restaurant Renovated
Pyongyang, March 21 (KCNA) -- Sinhung Restaurant has been successfully renovated in Hamhung City, South Hamgyong Province in the northern part of the DPRK.
					The construction of building No. 2 with a total floor space of 1 200 square meters would help increase the service capabilities.
					
					The first floor of building No. 1 has five dining rooms while the second floor two dining rooms and a banquet hall. The first floor of building No. 2 has three dining rooms while the second floor two dining rooms.
					
					The kitchens have been updated.
					
					An opening ceremony took place on Wednesday.

articles.title: Nation Urged to Force Lee Myung Bak Group to Pay for Anti-reunification Crimes
articles.content:
Nation Urged to Force Lee Myung Bak Group to Pay for Anti-reunification Crimes
Pyongyang, March 21 (KCNA) -- The Lee Myung Bak group of traitors has driven the inter-Korean relations into a total collapse. It should be forced to pay for this crime without fail. 
					Rodong Sinmun Wednesday urges this in a bylined article.
					
					It continues:
					
					The vicious moves of the Lee group to escalate the confrontation with fellow countrymen brought the precious gains in the June 15 era of reunification to naught and caused the inter-Korean ties to go back to those of mistrust and confrontation in the past.
					
					The Lee group chilled the atmosphere of warming the inter-Korean ties, crying out for "adhering to the principles".
					
					When the important news of the demise of the father of the nation was reported, the Lee group leveled guns at fellow countrymen in the bitter grief over it and went the lengths of letting loose unspeakable invectives over the Korean people's bitter tears, far from expressing condolences over it. 
					
					The Lee group is anti-reunification maniacs without parallel as it is getting frantic with confrontation racket, not feeling guilty of having bedeviled the inter-Korean relations at all.
					
					Hideous, indeed, are the anti-reunification crimes committed by the Lee group over the last four years.
					
					Nevertheless, it is getting all the more pronounced in its racket for confrontation with the DPRK, far from reflecting on its crimes.
					
					No one can predict what great misfortune and disaster the Koreans will suffer unless such confrontation maniacs are ousted from power.

articles.title: "Kim Il Sung's Korea", Special Write-ups to Centenary of His Birth (6)
articles.content:
"Kim Il Sung's Korea", Special Write-ups to Centenary of His Birth (6)
Kim Il Sung's Idea of Great National Unity
					
					Pyongyang, March 21 (KCNA) -- History teaches truth that united, a nation stands; divided, it falls.
					
					The victory in the Korean people's cause of national liberation depended on their united efforts.
					
					In the 1920s nationalist forces and campaigners of the early communist movement in Korea tried to bring about integration in their own ways, but they were engrossed in factional dispute and vain speculation without a correct idea of unity. 
					
					Penetrating into the situation, President Kim Il Sung set forth the line of the anti-Japanese national united front at the Kalun Meeting in June Juche 19 (1930), with his absolute trust in the people and confidence in their strength.
					
					It was his fixed view that the front should embrace all the patriotic forces of Korea, including conscientious capitalists, patriotic landlords and intellectuals.
					
					After the Nanhutou meeting in February 1936, he planned to organize the Association for the Restoration of the Fatherland (ARF) as an umbrella united front body representing the demand of the developing Korean revolution and strong desire of the Koreans.
					
					He personally worked out the programme, rules and inaugural declaration of the ARF during the breaks of arduous marches and consecutive battles with the Japanese imperialist aggressors.
					
					He convened a meeting in Tongjiang, Fusong Prefecture, in May 1936 to declare the birth of the ARF as a standing anti-Japanese national united front body and a strong underground revolutionary organization.
					
					All those present at the meeting elected him chairman of the Association. 
					
					He also proposed calling the organ of the ARF "Monthly Samil", symbolic of the spirit of the March First Popular Uprising waged by the Koreans against Japan.
					
					He specified in the ten-point programme of the Association its goal, which was to put an end to the Japanese imperialists' colonial rule and build a genuine country for the people in Korea. 
					
					Since then the anti-Japanese national united front movement had rapidly developed throughout the country on an organized and systematic basis in close combination with the anti-Japanese armed struggle, more effectively arousing all the patriotic forces to the struggle for liberation of the country. 
					
					To rally broad masses of people behind the Association, Kim Il Sung met Pak In Jin, a patriarch of Chondoism (national religion).
					
					He ardently called upon the patriarch to work hard for unity of the entire nation around the ARF so as to victoriously conclude the anti-Japanese sacred war and liberate the country.
					
					Immediately after its birth, the ARF extended its influence even to China and Japan as well as homeland and the anti-Japanese patriotic forces were united closer around it. 
					
					The ARF contributed to leading the all-out resistance against the Japanese imperialists to final victory.
					
					Thanks to this idea of great national unity and its tradition created during the anti-Japanese armed struggle, the Korean people could successfully carry out the anti-imperialist and anti-feudal democratic revolution even under the complex situation after the liberation of the country and defeat the U.S. imperialists in the Fatherland Liberation War (June 1950-July 1953). 
					
					Kim Il Sung's idea of great national unity and his feats in achieving it had been carried forward by leader Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: S. Korean Organization Announces Slogans for Actions against Lee Myung Bak Group
articles.content:
S. Korean Organization Announces Slogans for Actions against Lee Myung Bak Group
Pyongyang, March 21 (KCN) -- The Solidarity for Democracy, People's Life, Peaceful Reunification and Sovereignty of south Korea made public on March 17 slogans for immediate actions to check and frustrate the reckless war moves of the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors.
					They are as follows:
					
					Prevailing at present is a touch-and-go situation. Let's concentrate all efforts on defending peace against war!
					
					There has never been such serious danger of war. All out in the actions for peace against war!
					
					Let's avert a war and protect peace!
					
					Lee Myung Bak "government", stop rattling the north's nerves to spark a war and roll back its "hostile policy toward the north!"
					
					Lee Myung Bak, make an apology to the people for turning the atmosphere of reunification into that of war by scrapping the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration!
					
					Lee Myung Bak, make an apology to the people for deliberately getting on the north's nerves to escalate the danger of war!
					
					Minister of Defense Kim Kwan Jin and Chief for Foreign Strategy Planning Kim Thae Hyo, masterminds of the danger of war, step down immediately!
					
					Kim Kwan Jin, step down at once for deliberately insulting the supreme leadership of the north!
					
					Kim Thae Hyo, step down at once for shaping "the hostile policy toward the north" and raising "the north wind!"
					
					Let's vote against the "Saenuri" Party and vote for progressive and democratic candidates advocating peace in the general election!
					
					Let's punish the "Saenuri" Party, a war party, as it is keen to win votes by peddling "the north wind" for the purpose of the general election!
					
					Let's vote for progressive and democratic candidates advocating peace to prevent a war and defend peace!
					
					Let's all turn out in the struggle for peace against war!
					
					Let all the people turn out to defend peace!

articles.title: S. Korea Imports Huge Arms
articles.content:
S. Korea Imports Huge Arms
Pyongyang, March 21 (KCNA) -- South Korea imported lots of weapons from arms markets overseas in the period from 2007 to 2011, according to the south Korean CBS on March 19.
					The imports volume is enough to make south Korea the second largest arms importer in the world.
					
					This was clarified in a report by the Stockholm International Peace Research Institute in Sweden.

articles.title: South Headquarters of Pomminryon Vows to Fight against Lee Myung Bak Group
articles.content:
South Headquarters of Pomminryon Vows to Fight against Lee Myung Bak Group
Pyongyang, March 21 (KCNA) -- The South Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification (Pomminryon) on March 16 issued a statement denouncing the puppet authorities for intensifying the suppression of the pro-reunification movement organizations.
					The Seoul High Court staged a trial of Chairman Ri Kyu Jae and former Secretary General Choe Un A of the headquarters on the same day, the statement said, and went on: 
					
					The security authorities are cracking down upon the legitimate pro-reunification movement of the headquarters on charges of violation of the "Security Law".
					
					The statement strongly condemned the trial aimed at punishing members of the headquarters on false charges.
					
					Pomminryon is a legitimate organization conducting the movement for independence, peaceful reunification and great national unity under the uplifted banner of the June 15 joint declaration, the statement said, adding:
					
					The organization will carry on their actions against the group of traitors to the last for the dignity and interests of the nation and conduct a dynamic struggle for the repeal of the fascist law and an end to dictatorship.

articles.title: Overseas Koreans Express Strong Reverence for Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Overseas Koreans Express Strong Reverence for Kim Jong Il
Pyongyang, March 21 (KCNA) -- Overseas Koreans are expressing strong reverence for leader Kim Jong Il. 
					Hong In Hum, chairman of the Central Audit Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan, said Kim Jong Il covered the path of devotion to the country and the people by making forced march day and night. He provided powerful political, military and economic foundations for the eternal prosperity of the nation, Hong said.
					
					"The august name of Kim Jong Il and his kind image will remain in our hearts forever," he added. 
					
					Yun Kil Sang, chairman of the Federation of Koreans in the U.S., said that Kim Jong Il was the symbol of victory of socialism. 
					
					Noting that under his leadership the people in the homeland could always emerge victorious despite all hardships and ordeals, Yun added:
					
					The world looks enviously at the DPRK displaying its might as an invincible power. 
					
					Choe Un Bok, chairwoman of the General Association of Koreans in China, expressed the will to be faithful to the leadership of the dear respected Kim Jong Un, symbol of victory and glory, keeping in mind the honor and pride as an overseas citizen of Kim Il Sung's nation and Kim Jong Il's Korea.

articles.title: Koreans in China Condemn Lee Myung Bak Group for Escalating Confrontation
articles.content:
Koreans in China Condemn Lee Myung Bak Group for Escalating Confrontation
Pyongyang, March 21 (KCNA) -- The Shenyang branch of the General Association of Koreans in China issued a statement on Mar. 13 denouncing the south Korean regime for driving the situation on the Korean Peninsula into the worst phase.
					The statement accused Kim Kwan Jin, puppet minister of defense, the mastermind of the most hideous provocations, of desperately crying out for "punishment" on Yonphyong Island, while asserting "the north will surely provoke."
					
					The "Cheonan" warship case and Yonphyong Island shelling incident much touted by the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors are obviously the farces orchestrated by them and it deserves punishment for the crimes against the nation, it noted.
					
					The Koreans under the Shenyang branch will join the compatriots at home in the dynamic struggle to wipe out the Lee group and achieve the cause of national reunification, it stressed.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak Group's Provocations against DPRK Slammed
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak Group's Provocations against DPRK Slammed
Pyongyang, March 21 (KCNA) -- The World Federation of Democratic Youth on March 15 issued a statement in denunciation of the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors' vicious provocations against the DPRK.
					The south Korean military and "government" kicked off military drills obviously targeted against the DPRK and openly committed reckless acts of hurting the dignity of its supreme leadership, going beyond the bounds of provocation, the statement said, and went on:
					
					This is an intolerable insult to the Korean people in the period of mourning the loss of leader Kim Jong Il and a provocative act of posing a threat to the stability and peace in the region.
					
					The statement urged those responsible for the provocations to stop them, though belatedly, and make efforts to defuse the tension prevailing owing to those acts.
					
					The Mfumalanga Provincial Committee of the South African Communist Party and the South African Association of Friendship and Solidarity with Korean People in a joint statement on March 14 said that the Lee Myung Bak group is a heinous group of traitors that has no room to stay in this part of the world as it malignantly defamed the great leaders of the Korean people and progressive humankind.
					
					The Lee group should apologize for its crimes to the Korean people and the world progressives and step down at once, the statement noted, and went on:
					
					The Group for the Study of the Progressive Ideas of South Africa in a statement on March 13 branded Lee Myung Bak as enemy of the Korean nation and the root cause of war as he drove the inter-Korean relations into the worst phase and refused all forms of dialogue and negotiations, seeking the escalated tension only.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Published in Bulgaria
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Published in Bulgaria
Pyongyang, March 21 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il's work "The Juche Philosophy Is an Original Revolutionary Philosophy" was brought out in booklet by the Slavina Publishing House in Bulgaria on March 15.
					The work, published on July 26, 1996, clarifies the idea that the Juche philosophy is an original philosophy evolved and systematized with its peculiar principles and a revolutionary and popular philosophy which truly serves the purpose of the struggle of the popular masses for independence.
					
					It also indicates the tasks to study, explain and disseminate the Juche philosophy as required by the intention of the Party and thoroughly embody it to revolutionary practice.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung Lauded by Peruvian Organization
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung Lauded by Peruvian Organization
Pyongyang, March 21 (KCNA) -- The Peruvian Group for the Study of Kimilsungism on March 15 posted on its Internet homepage an article dedicated to the centenary of the birth of President Kim Il Sung.
					The article titled "President Kim Il Sung and the Day of the Sun" said that the President is the great leader of the Korean people who is always alive with the century.
					
					It went on:
					
					The Korean people and progressive humankind are highly praising and always respecting him as a legendary guerrilla hero, prominent statesman, founder of socialist Korea of Juche and far-sighted politician.
					
					The President was a legendary hero who defeated two imperialisms in one generation and set an example in the world revolution.
					
					The President applied the principle of the Juche idea into revolutionary practice, successfully built socialism in the DPRK and wisely led the struggle to achieve the independent and peaceful reunification of Korea.
					
					In fact, he was an outstanding leader representing the 20th century.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Reminiscences Introduced in Bulgaria
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Reminiscences Introduced in Bulgaria
Pyongyang, March 21 (KCNA) -- The Bulgaria-Korea Friendship Association on March 15 carried in its bulletin "The End of the 'Maeda Punitive Force'" from Chapter 21 of Vol. 7 (Continuing Edition) of Part 1 Anti-Japanese Revolution of President Kim Il Sung's reminiscences "With the Century" and "The Triumphant Return" from Chapter 24 of Vol. 8 (Continuing Edition).
					The bulletin carried the portrait of smiling Kim Il Sung.

articles.title: U.S. Is Meeting Setbacks in Afghan War: Special Envoy
articles.content:
U.S. Is Meeting Setbacks in Afghan War: Special Envoy
Moscow, March 20 (KCNA) -- The special envoy of the Russian president for Afghan issue, when interviewed by a broadcasting service recently, held that the U.S. is meeting setbacks in the Afghan war.
					A war syndrome similar to that of the Vietnamese war is manifested among the U.S. soldiers in Afghanistan, the special envoy said, adding the U.S. suffered a defeat in the Vietnamese war in the 20th century.
					
					The U.S. has so far failed to find a right strategy to settle the present situation where it is finding itself in mayhem, he noted.

articles.title: U.S. Drone Attacks under Fire in Pakistan
articles.content:
U.S. Drone Attacks under Fire in Pakistan
Pyongyang, March 21 (KCNA) -- The Pakistani Foreign Ministry spokesman Friday vehemently denounced drone strikes of the U.S. forces at a press conference.
					He expressed serious concern over U.S. drones' killings of civilians in Afghanistan and Pakistan, terming those strikes  illegal and renewing the call for a halt to the strikes.
					
					"We firmly believe that these strikes are damaging our efforts against militancy and terrorism. So it is high time that such activities should be stopped now," he said.

articles.title: Dismantlement of U.S. Military Base Demanded in Kyrgyzstan
articles.content:
Dismantlement of U.S. Military Base Demanded in Kyrgyzstan
Pyongyang, March 21 (KCNA) -- A meeting was held in Bishkek, Kyrgyzstan recently to demand the dismantlement of a U.S. air force base.
					The meeting held outside the U.S. embassy there was attended by many people from all walks of life. 
					
					Its participants lodged a protest with the U.S. forces against throwing out aviation fuel waste at random and polluting natural environment, holding placards reading "Yankees, go home!"
					
					They strongly demanded the U.S. forces' immediate pullback from their country.

articles.title: People Take to Streets to Protest in U.S., Canada
articles.content:
People Take to Streets to Protest in U.S., Canada
Pyongyang, March 21 (KCNA) -- "Occupy Wall Street" protesters marched through lower Manhattan in New York City on Saturday to mark the six-month anniversary of the birth of the Occupy movement, a media report said.
					More than 200 protesters gathered at Zuccotti Park and marched down lower Manhattan.
					
					During the march, some protesters were taken away in handcuffs for clashing with the police. 
					
					In Canada, Montreal's annual march against police brutality on March 15 led to stone-throwing, tear gas clouds and more than 100 arrests, police said.
					
					About 2 000 mostly young people took part in the Thursday night march.

articles.title: Iran Fully Backs Palestinian Cause: FM
articles.content:
Iran Fully Backs Palestinian Cause: FM
Tehran, March 20 (KCNA) -- Iranian Foreign Minister Ali Akbar Salehi explicitly voiced his country's support for the cause of Palestine, when meeting visiting Foreign Minister of the Palestinian Hamas-led government Mahmoud al-Zahar.
					Recent developments in the Middle East are awakening the Muslims in the region, while weakening the Zionists fronts, he noted. 
					
					"We are quite confident that the Palestinians will win the struggle," he added. 
					
					Condemning the dastard atrocities of the Zionist regime against the Palestinian people, Salehi said that supporting the cause of Palestine is among Iran's principles.

articles.title: Jordan Islamists Call for Boycotting Israeli Products
articles.content:
Jordan Islamists Call for Boycotting Israeli Products
Pyongyang, March 21 (KCNA) -- Jordan's Islamic organization on Sunday called for boycotting Israeli products in light of continued Israeli violence against the Palestinians.
					It called on traders to stop dealing with Israel and importing Israeli products as part of efforts to cut ties with Israel.

articles.title: Cooperation among Different Countries
articles.content:
Cooperation among Different Countries
Pyongyang, March 21 (KCNA) -- Chile and Argentina signed on March 16 six agreements to deepen integration of their countries.
					The accords cover bilateral cooperation in the fields of medicine development, policing and border control.
					
					Myanmar and Laos held talks on building Mekong River-crossing Bridge on March 16, official media reported.

articles.title: Cualquier provocacion sera tomada como declaracion de guerra
articles.content:
Cualquier provocacion sera tomada como declaracion de guerra
-Informacion de ACNC-
					Pyongyang, 21 de marzo (ACNC) -- En este mundo no hay otra nacion como la coreana que vive amenazada directa y largamente por las armas nucleares. Por eso, es tan fuerte su aspiracion  a ver cuanto antes una Peninsula Coreana desnuclearizada. 
					
					Debido a la politica conflictiva anti-Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y las maniobras de guerra nuclear de la banda del traidor surcoreano Lee Myung Bak, tal aspiracion nacional afronta un nuevo y grave desafio. 
					
					Es que las autoridades titeres surcoreanas andan atareadas ahora para convertir la inminente "Cumbre de Seguridad Nuclear" de Seul en un escenario de campana nuclear anti-RPDC. 
					
					En particular, dicen que la cumbre tiene "una importancia trascendental para el Sur de Corea amenazado por las armas nucleares" y sera el "primer paso para crear un mundo libre de armas nucleares", exponiendo su intencion de incluir en su agenda el "problema nuclear norcoreano". 
					
					Lee Myung Bak dijo absurdamente el dia 19 que la "cumbre desempenara el gran papel en ampliar la base de apoyo de la sociedad internacional sobre la desnuclearizacion del Norte".
					
					El ministro de Relaciones Exteriores y de Comercio, Kim Song Hwan, el delegado-jefe de las conversaciones a 6 bandas Rim Song Nam y otros responsables del debate de la desnuclearizacion de la Peninsula Coreana difunden unos malintencionadas rumores de que "es posible que en la cumbre haya discursos sobre el problema nuclear norcoreano, se publique una declaracion y se emita un mensaje demandando al Norte (de Corea) la renuncia de sustancias nucleares".
					
					Los medios de prensa conservadores del Sur de Corea transmiten versiones supervisadas de antemano por las autoridades, tales como "se preve el debate profundo del problema nuclear norcoreano" y "los paises interesados de las conversaciones a 6 bandas trataran de manera coordinada e intensiva el mismo tema". 
					
					Se elabora hasta el proyecto del "comunicado de Seul" tomando como premisa la "amenaza nuclear del Norte". 
					
					Esto comprueba claramente que la banda de Lee Myung Bak pretende aprovechar ese foro internacional como espacio de enfrentamiento anti-RPDC abusando de su posicion de anfitrion. 
					
					Indudablemente, la "Cumbre de Seguridad Nuclear" de Seul es la continuacion y ampliacion de la campana nuclear anti-RPDC que lanzan demencialmente los traidores surcoreanos. 
					
					La desnuclearizacion de la Peninsula Coreana abarca toda su extension geografica. En ese contexto, el "problema nuclear norcoreano" no existe  ni hay motivo de llevarlo a la cumbre. 
					
					Sin embargo, los compinches del traidor Lee se obstinan en remitirlo a la cumbre con el fin de justificar su campana de guerra nuclear anti-RPDC y dar el primer paso de su farsa politica internacional encaminada a evitar la derrota en las proximas "elecciones" distrayendo la atencion de la indignada poblacion surcoreana.
					
					Como parte de ello, iniciaron ya los ejercicios bajo el pretexto de "hacer frente al terrorismo con armas biologicas del Norte o a su ataque para perturbar el GPS", tales como "entrenamiento conjunto de defensa de civiles, funcionarios del gobierno, militares y policias" y "entrenamiento combinando antiterrorista".
					
					Mientras tanto, el ministro de Defensa Nacional del Sur de Corea, Kim Kwan Jin, ordeno que si el Norte (de Corea) comete una provocacion, "le disparen hasta 10 veces de lo que vaya a tirar" y "castiguen hasta rendirse con el animo de tomar venganza por el caso de hundimiento de la corbeta 'Cheonan' y el de fuego artillero en la isla Yonphyong".
					
					El jefe de la Junta de Jefes de Estado Mayor, Jong Sung Jo, se pronuncio tambien en ese sentido diciendo que "hay que hacer al Norte arrepentirse profundamente".
					
					No se puede pasar por alto las pretensiones de ellos de aprovechar la cumbre de Seul para dar inicio a la guerra nuclear contra la RPDC.
					
					Nadie puede afirmar que el traidor Lee Myung Bak no empleara esa reunion en sus siniestros objetivos, si se toma en cuenta que el ha sido capaz de cualquier cosa para romper las relaciones Norte-Sur de Corea.
					
					Lo demuestran los movimientos aviesos de la banda del traidor Lee despues de publicada la noticia de lanzamiento de "Kwangmyongsong-3" en abril proximo.
					
					Todos podran imaginar claramente como actuara en la cumbre la banda de Lee que se desespera por atentar la soberania de la RPDC negando hasta el derecho a usar el espacio con fines pacificos.
					
					Hoy en dia, la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana llega a la fase incontrolable debido a la canallada de los traidores surcoreanos que se atrevieron a ofender la maxima dignidad de la RPDC.
					
					Nadie puede pronosticar como evolucionara la situacion.
					
					En particular, si se reportan actos provocativos en la cumbre de Seul, tales como la  "publicacion de una declaracion" en torno al "problema nuclear norcoreano", esto sera registrado en la historia como insulto a los legados de los Grandes Hombres del monte Paektu sobre la desnuclearizacion de la Peninsula Coreana y como otro gran crimen que no sera expiado nunca.
					
					Es una burla a la opinion publica interna y externa y una verguenza del mundo que la "Cumbre de Seguridad Nuclear" se abra precisamente en el suelo surcoreano convertido en el mayor arsenal nuclear del mundo.
					
					Sumarse a la conducta imprudente del traidor Lee llevara de mal en peor la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana como la gasolina echada al fuego.
					
					Cualquier provocacion sera tomada por la RPDC como declaracion de guerra y sus consecuencias complicaran seriamente los debates de la desnuclearizacion de la Peninsula Coreana.

articles.title: Cientificos coreanos defienden el derecho de lanzar satelite artificial
articles.content:
Cientificos coreanos defienden el derecho de lanzar satelite artificial
Pyongyang, 21 de marzo (ACNC) -- El pasado dia 16, la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea anuncio que lanzaria el "Kwangmyongsong-3", satelite artificial de observacion de la Tierra, en abril proximo cuando se celebrara el centenario de nacimiento del Presidente Kim Il Sung.
					En torno a esa noticia que demostrara a todo el mundo el poderio nacional de la RPDC con altos niveles de ciencias y tecnicas, algunas fuerzas intensifican sus criticas a la RPDC insistiendo en que es un "misil" lo que va a lanzar ella.
					
					Indignados por esa calumnia, los cientificos coreanos expresan asi a la ACNC:
					
					Kim Haeng Son (63 anos de edad), jefe de catedra de la Universidad Politecnica Kim Chaek dijo:
					
					El lanzamiento de satelites ya es una tendencia mundial y no es una prerrogativa de algunos paises.
					
					Practicamente, muchos paises y regiones del orbe estan profundizando la investigacion sobre los usos del espacio cosmico y aplican activamente sus resultados.
					
					Pero, algunas fuerzas censuran de una manera u otra dicho proyecto espacial de la RPDC expresando su malestar. Esto no tiene otra interpretacion que un acto de intervencion abierta en el Estado soberano.
					
					El lanzamiento de "Kwangmyongsong-3" es un tema relacionado con la soberania de la RPDC.
					
					Digan lo que digan otros, nuestro satelite se lanzara sin falta al cielo demostrando el poderio de la autarquica economia nacional de nuestro pais.
					
					Choe Kwang Guk (49 anos), subdirector del Instituto Central de Pronosticos del Tiempo de la Direccion Meteorologica e Hidrologica de la RPDC destaco:
					
					El lanzamiento de satelite de usos practicos, que promueve el desarrollo cientifico y tecnico de cada pais, es un derecho legitimo de la RPDC.
					
					Todos tienen derecho de escoger las opciones.
					
					?Como es posible que la conquista del cosmos, patrimonio comun de la humanidad, sea privilegio de algunos paises?
					
					No se puede aceptarlo nunca.
					
					El satelite practico a cargo de investigar y pronosticar el proceso de cambio climatico global en la atmosfera, el mar y la tierra es imprescindible al dominio meteorologico e hidrologico.
					
					Por eso, nuestros meteorologos prestan mucha atencion al lanzamiento de "Kwangmyongsong-3".
					
					Nadie tiene derecho a censurar esa libre y equitativa opcion de la RPDC.

articles.title: Denuncian en el extranjero la provocacion de Lee Myung Bak
articles.content:
Denuncian en el extranjero la provocacion de Lee Myung Bak
Pyongyang, 21 de marzo (ACNC) -- La Federacion Mundial de la Juventud Democratica publico el dia 15 una declaracion denunciando la peor provocacion cometida por la banda del traidor surcoreano Lee Myung Bak contra la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					La organizacion juvenil senalo en su nota que el circulo militar y el "gobierno" del Sur de Corea libraron los ejercicios militares que apuntan evidentemente a la RPDC y ofendieron publicamente la maxima dignidad de esta.
					
					Destaco que esto es el peor insulto para el pueblo coreano todavia en duelo nacional por el deceso del Dirigente Kim Jong Il y una provocacion que amenaza la estabilidad y la paz de la region.
					
					Demando a los responsables del caso que cesen sus acciones provocativas y se esfuercen por relajar la tension creada por su culpa.
					
					El Comite Provincial de Mfumalanga del Partido Comunista Sudafricano y la Asociacion Sudafricana de Amistad y Solidaridad con el Pueblo Coreano, en su declaracion conjunta fechada 14, subrayaron que la banda de Lee, que ofendio a los grandes lideres del pueblo coreano y la humanidad progresista, es la horda de traidores que debe ser liquidada del globo terraqueo.
					
					Insistio en que la camarilla de Lee pida disculpas por sus crimenes cometidos ante el pueblo coreano y la humanidad progresista del mundo y se retire ahora mismo del poder.
					
					El Grupo de Estudio de las Ideas Progresistas de Sudafrica enfatizo en su nota fechada 13 que el traidor Lee es el enemigo de la nacion coreana y la causa de guerra que llevo a la peor fase las relaciones intercoreanas y persigue solo la agravacion de tensiones rechazando los dialogos y negociaciones de todo tipo con la RPDC.
